titles.title: Taiko no Tatsujin: Juugo Shuunenkinen Short Animation
Taiko no Tatsujin: 15 Shuunenkinen Short Animation
太鼓の達人15周年記念ショートアニメーション
Taiko: Drum Master

anime.description: Toshio Suzuki and Studio Ghibli produced the short to commemorate the 15th anniversary of the Taiko no Tatsujin (Taiko: Drum Master) rhythm game series. The short features Taiko no Tatsujin characters Don-chan and Kacchan, as well as an original mouse character.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.
